attributes.action: Implement bag searches and airport type security for the rail network.
attributes.additional_details: So incidents like the Doncaster to Huntingdon attack don’t happen again.
attributes.background: Implement new laws and standards to ensure the safety of passengers riding trains.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Require metal detectors and bag and ID checks at all mainline railway stations" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749049
